name: Burrito combo menu
description: 1 optional burrito, optional dip and 1 optional soft drink/water. Served with tortilla chips.

name: Burrito bowl combo menu
description: 1 optional burrito bowl and 1 optional soft drink/water. Served with tortilla chips and optional dip.

name: Chili con carne bowl combo menu
description: 1 chili con carne bowl of your choice and 1 soft drink/water of your choice. Served with tortilla chips

name: Ensalada bowl combo menu
description: 1 optional ensalada bowl and 1 optional soft drink/water. Served with tortilla chips

name: Quesadilla combo menu
description: 1 optional quesadilla, 2 optional dips and 1 optional soft drink/water. Served with tortilla chips.

name: Taco kit combo menu
description: 1 build yourself Taco kit, 1 optional dip and 1 optional soft drink/water. Served with tortilla chips.
